attributes.action: Provide Breakaway Techniques Training in Schools for teens, so that if attacked, they can break free and get to safety.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work with people with Learning Disability and was recently on this course, provided by the local HSC Trust. This was mainly aimed at people who work with Mentally ill or Learning Disabled People who come across violence from time to time. I felt it was an excellent course, teaching us skills which most people should know about. I feel that a compulsory course for all, perhaps starting with the teen school years, would be very advantageous. eg. fending off a rapist or other attacker.
